lead_paragraph: By his own admission, Michael Phelps could not have scripted it  better as he won back the title closest to his heart on an evening of pure gold for the most medaled Olympic athlete of all time.

headline.main: Phelps Wins Back the One That Got Away
headline.print_headline: Phelps Wins Back the One That Got Away
